name: kaya
description: A modern, elegant Go (Baduk/Weiqi) game application with beautiful interface, SGF support, game tree navigation, and AI analysis powered by KataGo

scripts.dev:web: bun run generate-version-info && bun run copy-assets && bun run build:packages && bun --filter @kaya/web dev
scripts.dev:desktop: bun run generate-version-info && bun run tauri:dev
scripts.build:web: bun run generate-version-info && bun run generate-pwa-assets && bun run copy-assets && bun run build:packages && bun --filter @kaya/web build
scripts.build:desktop: bun run generate-version-info && bun run copy-assets && bun run build:packages && bun --filter @kaya/desktop build
scripts.build:packages: bun run --filter @kaya/goboard build && bun run --filter @kaya/sgf build && bun run --filter @kaya/gametree build && bun run --filter @kaya/gtp build && bun run --filter @kaya/boardmatcher build && bun run --filter @kaya/deadstones build && bun run --filter @kaya/ai-engine build && bun run --filter @kaya/shudan build && bun run --filter @kaya/ui build
scripts.clean: rm -rf packages/*/dist apps/*/dist node_modules/.cache && echo 'âœ… Build artifacts cleared'
